name: canshare-nuclear-grade
title: NZ cancer nuclear grade of DCIS grade
description: The grade of a breast cancer, assessed using the nuclear ductal carcinoma in situ grading system.

filter.value: ^ 253271000210106 |New Zealand cancer nuclear grade of DCIS grade reference set|

contains.display: DCIS nuclear pleomorphism, grade 1: monotonous nuclei, 1.5 - 2.0 RBC diameters, with finely dispersed chromatin and only occasional nucleoli
DCIS nuclear pleomorphism, grade 2: neither nuclear grade 1 nor nuclear grade 3
DCIS nuclear pleomorphism, grade 3: Markedly pleomorphic nuclei, usually >2.5 RBC diameters, with coarse chromatin and multiple nucleoli
